name: Dragunity Knight - Harloon
desc:
1 "Dragunity" Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
If this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 "Dragunity" monster in your GY; equip it to this card.  If this card is sent to the GY: You can target 1 "Dragunity" monster you control; equip this card to that target.  It gains 1000 ATK/DEF.  You can only use each effect of "Dragunity Knight - Harloon" once per turn.
